item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 31, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. The GTA III port for the Dreamcast has been released (234 points | 57 comments)

10. Just Words (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
